DOC.brief_summary: The study is intended to examine the safety and efficacy of computerized mobilization of the neck for the treatment of patients with chronic neck pain. This is a third continuation study aimed at examining the Occiflex Robotic System. This time we will be studying tailored or personalized three dimensional movement of the neck.
DOC.brief_title: Tailored Computerized Mobilization of the Cervical Spine Utilizing the Occiflex Device for the Treatment of Chronic Neck Pain
DOC.criteria: Patients with chronic neck pain: postwhiplash injury, myofacial pain, cervical facet joint disease and idiopathic chronic neck pain Patients with cervical radiculopathy Myelopathy Discopathy Malignancy involving the neck or cervical spine Severe Osteoporosis Severe skin disorder Psychiatric disorders Cervical disc herniation
DOC.keyword: Chronic Neck Pain, Occiflex, Computerized Mobilization
